Class Courses

  • java.lang.Object
    • Courses

  • public class Courses
extends java.lang.Object
    This class collect information on each course Able to also create, remove, and find assignments within the array
    Author:
    Bao Tran

      • setPercentage

        public void setPercentage(double exam,
                 double homework,
                 double inClass,
                 double lab,
                 double project)
        Allow the user to specified the percentage of each assignments of the class
        Parameters:
        exam - Weighted percent of each exam
        homework - Weighted percent of each homework assignments
        inClass - Weighted percent of each in class assignments
        lab - Weighted percent of each lab
        project - Weighted percent of each project

      • getCourseGrade

        public double getCourseGrade()
        Calculate the average grade for each assignments, then weight them Will only calculate the types of grades that were specified by the user
        Returns:
